chapters.title: Chapter 3: The Ways of Honor
chapters.info: Melaine, p. 85—Wise One of the of the Jhirad sept of the Goshien Aiel. She is a Dreamwalker, and was one of Egwene's teachers. She can channel. She swore she would never love a man, but changed her mind later and married Bael, her clan chief, thus becoming sister-wife to Dorindha. She has sun-colored hair and green eyes. She is currently expecting twin daughters; the pregnancy is just beginning to show. See also Bael; Dorindha.
